synopsis.text: Though he harbors feelings for an older woman, the ordinary life of 15-year-old Iwaki Tomonori takes an unexpected turn when he discovers that the Japanese government has married him off to a 12-year-old girl named Rizel. The young girl, far from ordinary, is the product of a secret government experiment in genetic engineering. With an insatiable need for love to aid her development and explosive tears that can wreak havoc, Rizel is no ordinary bride. Despite his initial reluctance and the financial struggles of his family, Iwaki is left with no choice but to welcome Rizel into his home, embarking on a chaotic and unpredictable journey with his newfound wife.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
